TEI.2.document_author: James E. B. Austin and John Austin
TEI.2.document_title: James E. B. Austin and John Austin to Unknown, 11-22-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Articles of partnership. James E. B. Austin and John Austin to build and operate a cotton gin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1234-1235

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Articles of partnership. James E. B. Austin and John Austin to build and operate a cotton gin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*This agreement, between *person_mentioned*James E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* witnesseth that the said *person_mentioned*James*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned* have associated themselves in *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*for the objects and on the footing stated below that is to say, the objects of said partnership are to build a *location_mentioned*Gin*/location_mentioned*, and carry on the ginning business, *location_mentioned*on the land granted to said *person_mentioned*James*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* in this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, and also to engage in commercial buisness generally—*/p*
*p*The conditions of the *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*are that all capital or advances made by eather of said parties shall be charged to the *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*and accounted for at the expiration of the *person_mentioned*partnership*/person_mentioned*,— The nett profits of the *person_mentioned*concern */person_mentioned*shall be equally divided between the *person_mentioned*parties*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*shall continue for *date_mentioned n="11-22-1827">two years*/date_mentioned* unless sooner dissolved by mutual Consent—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas. E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-22-1825">November 22nd 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
